creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: one very large character at far R; two lines of graceful calligraphy at center; two smaller lines at far L with inscription and signature; rectangular intaglio stamp URC; circular relief stamp with waves at LLC
inscription: L edge: (Inscribed as written the last month of 1865 at the age of 80 - SA)
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio seal; LLC, circular relief seal
title: Blessings
